name: Microscopic Armored Division: Operation COVID19
description:
Shrink down as a tiny tank to kill viruses! Destroy the spawners before you get overrun by viruses.

Controls:

  • W - Move Foreward
  • S - Move Backword
  • A - Rotate Body Counter-Clockwise
  • D - Rotate Body Clockwise
  • Right Arrow - Rotate Turret Clockwise
  • Left-Arrow - Rotate Turret Counter-Clockwise
  • Space - Fire
